briefTitle: A Phase III Study of A01016 in Subjects With Symptomatic Vitreomacular Adhesion
officialTitle: A Phase III Study of A01016 125Î¼g Intravitreal Injection in Subjects With Symptomatic Vitreomacular Adhesion - Comparison Study to Sham Injection
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the superiority regarding vitreomacular adhesion (VMA) resolution of a single intravitreal injection of A01016 (Ocriplasmin) compared to sham-injection in subjects with symptomatic VMA.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Subjects With Non-Surgical Resolution of Vitreomacular Adhesion (VMA)
